workExperience.title: Computer Science Tutor
workExperience.description: Proficient in tutoring Java and C++ programming languages, I develop personalized lesson plans and teaching strategies to accommodate diverse learning styles, facilitate interactive coding exercises and projects, and ensure comprehension and mastery of principles, syntax, concepts, and best practices.

workExperience.title: Customer Representative
workExperience.description: Providing expert guidance and technical support to Microsoft customers to ensure seamless access and optimal utilization of Microsoft products, I achieved a monthly customer satisfaction rating above 80% and collaborated with colleagues and supervisors to cultivate a productive problem-solving environment through effective communication.

education.title: Minor Degree
education.description: I'm also pursuing a minor in Business.
